text: Mayangunna Manassukal is a 1992 Indian Malayalam film, directed by S. Manikandan, starring M. G. Soman and Jagathy Sreekumar in the lead roles. ==Cast== * Jagathy Sreekumar as V. K. * Prathapachandran as Vijaya Kumar * Janardanan as Saimon * M. G. Soman as Fernandez *Kollam Ajith as Police Inspector *Ravi Menon as Tony ==References== ==External links== * Category:1992 films Category:Indian films Category:1990s Malayalam-language films
title: Mayangunna Manassukal
